title: Poul Anderson - Brain Wave
description:
What happens when the Earth suddenly leaves a segment of space that has had the properties of an intelligence inhibitor? Almost overnight the I.Q. of every living creature is trebled. What are the inevitable consequences of such instant genius? What would become of the economy? What would a farmer do when his intelligent sheep are hunted by wolves of genius? But the biggest problem is the ultimate one - in a world without problems, where all the questions that have plagued mankind throughout history are solved, what is man to do with his time?



Read by Tom Weiner
Format: MP3
Bitrate: 64 Kbps
